page.title: 10Shopping
page.content: The 'Trade' group have been studying the shops in Seaton Delaval. Many{ {shops}in our town are owned by families who have lived here for many years. For example, a local newsagents, Hartshornes, has been a newsagents for about 70 years and was a boot shop before that. There is a large Co-op where most people do their weekly shopping and get their daily stock. We have also been collecting{ {labels}from tins etc. to see where the food eaten in Seaton Delaval comes from. We found that most of our food comes from the UK.We did a survey of the{commercial traffic}that goes past our school and found that most of it was leaving Seaton Delaval. We found a great deal of information about trade by sending a questionnaire to every shop in the town.
